allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Intercom messenger demo and contact form pages

- index.html: Simple page with Intercom messenger widget
- contact.html: Basic contact form with name, email, subject, and message fields

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update app ID in widget script URL

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Reorganize into multi-messenger testing hub

- index.html: Hub page linking to all messenger test pages
- messenger1.html: Existing messenger with app ID rpcrzsiu
- messenger2.html: Template ready for new app ID

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
